## TinySynq.runQuery() method

Run an operation against the DB

**Signature:**

```typescript
runQuery<T = any>(params: QueryParams): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [QueryParams](./tinysynq-node.queryparams.md) | The SQL query and optionally any values |

**Returns:**

T

Array of records returned from the database
